name: Add new WPForms entries as rows in Google Sheets
description: Streamline your data collection process by automatically adding new form entries from WPForms to Google Sheets. With this template, every time a new entry is submitted through your WPForms, Make will seamlessly create a new row in your Google Sheets, ensuring that all your data is organized and easily accessible for analysis and reporting. Say goodbye to manual data entry and enhance your workflow efficiency!
